subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I dont think name calling is aceptible

Exactly! still amazes me that we have voices breaking through a radio that =
shouldnt be their, even if they dont make sense, the point is what the hell=
 are they doing there! but even if they are hoaxing around, just shows they=
 are as human as they were in a present life and like to mess people around=
 because they probably realise people hang on to their every word.

keep up=
 the good work guys!




________________________________
From: Zack Widup =
<w9sz.zack@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, 18 August,=
 2009 22:12:38
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I dont think name calling is acep=
tible

=A0 
Still, you gotta admit it's fascinating that you're getting any=
thing at all, even if it's BS.

Zack


On Tue, Aug 18, 2009 at 3:35 PM, pur=
plespacefriend <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> wrote:

=A0 
>
>Same old stuff,=
 one's opinion is absolute gospel, and if I, or anyone points out the facts=
 we are just the worst bastards that ever lived!
>
>I've told everyone for =
years that asking questions results in unreliable informatrion, and when I =
asked questions to try to get more information I got pure BS. But since tha=
t contradicts all the real box experts out there, who insist that they alon=
e know how to ask the right qquestions, and I must be somkind of idiot moro=
n. I just invented this crap, how could I possibly understand how it works!=
? No, leave that to some duffus that assembles messages to be the real expe=
rt. 
>
>At least I'm honest enough to tell people I tried the "asccepted" m=
ethod of box use and it's crap. 
>
>frank-S 
>
>
>--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s .com, John Brill <jba5656@...> wrote:
>>
>> Zack,
>> 
>> I do not meen to=
 offend anyone but I do not think just because you are a person who started=
 this forum that you have the rite to insult and offend people for speaking=
 there opinion.
>> 
>> Is that not what this and other groups are about. so=
meone else said the rules here are if you are insulting or mean then you wi=
ll be baned does that not go for every one or is it just a few people can s=
ay what they want and others will be baned ?
>> 
>> I said I did not meen t=
o insult anyone but I feel there is an injustuce here and favoratsm wich is=
 wrong in any group.
>> 
>> why is it do as i say not as i do. the rules sh=
ould be for everyone no matter what. if you aply this thinking to every thi=
ng we would be living in a world were people were in prison for doing a cri=
me and the people in goverment could do as they please to sell drugs or kil=
l or whatever and get away with it.
>> 
>> we should not have to be USED TO=
 someone who can akt and insult who ever he wants too when ever he wants to=
o.
>> 
>> that is my opinion.
>> pleese forgive my english.
>> 
>> John
>> =

>> 
>>

>>

of us who have been around here half of forever are used to him and aren't =

>> 
>> Zack
>>

>> >I am sorry but I do not think it=

>> >

wish to make enimies just learn.
>> >
